name: Ritual Ceremony (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect: Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, you can reveal 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, add 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand whose name is mentioned on that Ritual Monster, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck.
